title: Android app deals of the day: Agatha Knife , Zombie Night Terror, Card Quest, more
content:
We are now ready to gather up all of Friday’s best Android game and app deals into one handy list for you. Just be sure to scope out the Samsung Galaxy S21 5G at $295 off as well as all of these Google smart home deals while you’re at it. Today’s software collection features price drops on titles like Agatha Knife , Zombie Night Terror, Card Quest, Gallery, Document Scanner, and much more. Head below the fold for all of this weekend’s best Android app deals.
